about_the_game:
Play tennis and admire the girl.

You play tennis against a computer opponent, your task is to hit the balls and hit so that the enemy could not hit, the game goes up to 3 points, whoever scores first and wins.

You need to hit the ball with the left mouse button pressed, while you will be distracted by cute girl in the background.

1. You can admire girl
2. You can play tennis

Tennis is a sport in which two players compete.
The task of the rivals - a tennis player or a tennis player - is to send the ball to the opponent's side with the help of rackets so that he could not reflect it, no more than after the first fall of the ball on the playing field in the opponent's half.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains drawings of girls in lingerie

You need to hit the ball with the left mouse button pressed, while you will be distracted by cute girl in the background.

Tennis is a sport in which two players compete.
The task of the rivals - a tennis player or a tennis player - is to send the ball to the opponent's side with the help of rackets so that he could not reflect it, no more than after the first fall of the ball on the playing field in the opponent's half.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 32-bit 12.04+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Phenom II
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
